CustomField.description: This field indicates if the FAT (Fiber Access Terminal) is connected to a Mobility Tower in which case the impact will be huge in case of an issue with this FAT
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field indicates if the FAT i(Fiber Access Terminal) s connected to a Mobility Tower in which case the impact will be huge in case of an issue with this FAT
CustomField.label: Is Mobility Connected
